result.eng: We need to take a chance and try it.
result.ga: Caithfidh muid dul sa seans agus triail a bhaint as
result.orig: Caithfidh muid dul sa seans agus triail a bhaint as
result.html: Caithfidh muid dul sa seans agus triail a bhaint asWe need to take a chance and try it.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ muid dul sa seans agus triail a ḃaint asWe need to take a chance and try it.

result.eng: Although we don’t have a chance, we'll run the race.
result.ga: Cé nach bhfuil seans againn rithfidh muid an rása
result.orig: Cé nach bhfuil seans againn rithfidh muid an rása
result.html: Cé nach bhfuil seans againn rithfidh muid an rásaAlthough we don’t have a chance, we'll run the race.
result.ponchtml: Cé naċ ḃfuil seans againn riṫfiḋ muid an rásaAlthough we don’t have a chance, we'll run the race.

result.ga: Gach seans go dtiocfaidh siad amárach
result.orig: Gach seans go dtiocfaidh siad amárach
result.html: Gach seans go dtiocfaidh siad amárachThey will probably arrive tomorrow.
result.ponchtml: Gaċ seans go dtiocfaiḋ siad amáraċThey will probably arrive tomorrow.

result.eng: I didn't have a chance to get an education.
result.ga: Ní raibh seans agam foghlaim a fháil
result.orig: Ní raibh seans agam foghlaim a fháil
result.html: Ní raibh seans agam foghlaim a fháilI didn't have a chance to get an education.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ seans agam foġlaim a ḟáilI didn't have a chance to get an education.

result.eng: He doesn't have a chance in the race.
result.html: Níl seans aige sa rásaHe doesn't have a chance in the race.
result.ponchtml: Níl seans aige sa rásaHe doesn't have a chance in the race.

result.ga: Seans go bhfuil an ceart agat
result.orig: Seans go bhfuil an ceart agat
result.html: Seans go bhfuil an ceart agatYou may be right.
result.ponchtml: Seans go ḃfuil an ceart agatYou may be right.

result.ga: Seans go bhfuil sé seo ar eolas agaibh cheana
result.orig: Seans go bhfuil sé seo ar eolas agaibh cheana
result.html: Seans go bhfuil sé seo ar eolas agaibh cheanaYou may know this already.
result.ponchtml: Seans go ḃfuil sé seo ar eolas agaiḃ ċeanaYou may know this already.

result.html: Tá seans maith agatYou have a good chance.
result.ponchtml: Tá seans maiṫ agatYou have a good chance.

result.eng: I am a housewife and I don't have much chance to speak with other people except my husband and my children.
result.ga: Is bean tí mé agus ní bhíonn mórán seans agam labhairt le daoine eile seachas m'fhear agus mo chlann
result.orig: Is bean tí mé agus ní bhíonn mórán seans agam labhairt le daoine eile seachas m'fhear agus mo chlann
result.html: Is bean tí mé agus ní bhíonn mórán seans agam labhairt le daoine eile seachas m'fhear agus mo chlannI am a housewife and I don't have much chance to speak with other people except my husband and my children.
result.ponchtml: Is bean tí mé agus ní ḃíonn mórán seans agam laḃairt le daoine eile seaċas m'ḟear agus mo ċlannI am a housewife and I don't have much chance to speak with other people except my husband and my children.

result.eng: A microblogging service of its kind [ie Twitter] is probably better suited to a busy person who wants to share his opinions.
result.ga: Seans gur fearr a fhóireann seirbhís mhicreabhlagála dá chineál don duine gnóthach atá ag iarraidh tuairimí a nochtadh
result.orig: Seans gur fearr a fhóireann seirbhís mhicreabhlagála dá chineál don duine gnóthach atá ag iarraidh tuairimí a nochtadh
result.html: Seans gur fearr a fhóireann seirbhís mhicreabhlagála dá chineál don duine gnóthach atá ag iarraidh tuairimí a nochtadhA microblogging service of its kind [ie Twitter] is probably better suited to a busy person who wants to share his opinions.
result.ponchtml: Seans gur fearr a ḟóireann seirḃís ṁicreaḃlagála dá ċineál don duine gnóṫaċ atá ag iarraiḋ tuairimí a noċtaḋA microblogging service of its kind [ie Twitter] is probably better suited to a busy person who wants to share his opinions.
